c74object.name: denormkiller~
c74object.description: depack is a non-typed version of unpack for situations in which you need to unpack a list of unknown, or varying types.

objarg.name: outlets
objarg.description: Setting an int as the first argument defines the number of outlets, and in turn the number of list items that depack will recognise.

method.name: input
method.digest: Input a list to be unpacked
method.description:
A list input will be unpacked with each item being output from its own outlet up to the specified number of outlets.
Items in the list do not need their types specified beforehand.
If the list length is greater than the number of outlets, the items past the range will be ignored.

entry.name: anything
entry.description: The Nth outlet outputs the Nth item from the input list without the need to specify a type.
